meta.title: About
meta.description: Learn more about Antoine and his creative journey

content.p1: As an artist, I believe in the power of daily practice and continuous exploration. Each sketch in my collection represents a moment of discovery, a question asked through pencil and paper.
content.p2: My work blends traditional illustration techniques with modern AI-assisted tools, creating a unique dialogue between human creativity and technological possibility. Through this digital sketchbook, I invite you to experience the stories behind each piece.
